Title: Makes certain fees and charges related to emergency medical services permanent
Summary: Makes certain fees and charges related to emergency medical services permanent.
LawCode: Amd Part KK ยง4, Chap 55 of 2022
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 55 of the laws of 2022, amending the general municipal law and the town law relating to authorizing fees and charges for emergency medical services, in relation to making such provisions permanent
